div1.p: Sr; pay sixty days after date unto Mr A Gallatan or Order two Hundred and Seventy Dollars, it being for value recvd of him this 2 day of March 1810
[Endorsements:] Mr Butler please to pay the within to The Barer Isaac L Morton and oblige
Hereulaneum March 13. 1810 I will pay the with in order in the time mentioned.
Rec'd St Louis 30th Octr 1810 of M. Austin, One hundred Dollars on the within—$100 Red on the within Forty Doll and Forty cents
I will pay the within Balance on demand in Lead at five dollars and fifty or Cash at Cash price
